attributes.action: Insist the bbc use British imperial measurements in its programming
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: the bbc is using metric measurements and ignoring the majority of british subjects who cannot comprehend the metric system. so they could also help the majority by using the imperial system

rejection.details: This is a matter for the BBC, not Government.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
